name: Spell Sling
description:
Enable Full Screen  (for best results)

In Spell Slinger you play a wizard janitor of sorts... All the spells have gotten out of their spell books and you have to get them back where they belong. 

There are still a lot of bugs, and there is a ton of functionality and additional mechanics we would like to add but we are running up against a tight deadline and lack of skill on our side so here is a basic mechanics demo for now.

We just started learning Unity and this is our first game. We joined the Weekly Game Jam #131 in the hopes that it would kickstart our learning and force us to finish something quickly.

#italmostkilledus
